channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-11345] TestPointFields.testDoublePointFieldSortAndFunction() failure
item.description:
Reproduces for me on branch_7_0 with Java 8, from https://jenkins.thetaphi.de/job/Lucene-Solr-7.0-Linux/332/:

Checking out Revision 3ba304b29825a94249c5145b3f5061e87b87d8f8 (refs/remotes/origin/branch_7_0)
[...]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The issue here is that the expected ordering of doubles truncated to floats (via Double.floatValue()) doesn't match Solr's. I think that's irrelevant; the ordering of truncated doubles is essentially random - who cares about the predictability of this random ordering? This patch restricts random value generation in helper method doTestDoublePointFunctionQuery() to float range, to avoid useless results.

I beasted the full test suite 100 times with the patch; all passed. Committing shortly.

Commit ac777af867a1f1e4f929373c17f3d66bd9b59dd4 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_7x from steve_rowe
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=ac777af ]

SOLR-11345: restrict double field values used for function queries to float range

Commit 5f68eb945626d6fb25d7fb23ee16f255aa23a9f2 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from steve_rowe
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=5f68eb9 ]

SOLR-11345: restrict double field values used for function queries to float range

Commit cacb374fa867df856dcc807462cde74d689af2a9 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_7x from steve_rowe
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=cacb374 ]

SOLR-11345: TestPointFields.doTestDoublePointFunctionQuery() helper: fix generated # of values (was 10, should be 'numVals')

Commit 0359db97b5f3b045abfc12cbc118b99196911169 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from steve_rowe
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=0359db9 ]

SOLR-11345: TestPointFields.doTestDoublePointFunctionQuery() helper: fix generated # of values (was 10, should be 'numVals')
